Browser.Entry: Type "open browser" to open your content browser
Type "open " plus one of the subcategories to open further folders
Type "back" to move up a level in the hierarchy

Camera.Entry1: Type "open camera" to launch the camera feed
Camera.Entry2: Type "zoom in" to enhance the camera's vision
Camera.Entry3: Type "analyze" to launch the camera's analytics mode

Movement.Entry1: Type "go to" and coordinates to send a move order to your robot
